incidents.name: Multiple Product Errors in IE1

incident_updates.body: All services impacted by an issue with Conversations and Programmable Chat API-s and SDK-s in the IE1 region have recovered and are operating as intended. This incident has been resolved.

All services are recovered except for Accounts API; specifically, accounts created via Accounts API since approximately 2:10AM PT on 7 December 2023 are unavailable in IE1 region. Teams are working to restore normal functionality. We will provide another update in 12 hours or as soon as more information is available.

All services are recovered except for Accounts API; specifically, accounts created via Accounts API since approximately 2:10AM PT on 7 December 2023 are unavailable in IE1 region. Teams are working to restore normal functionality. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information is available.

All services are recovered except for Accounts API; specifically, accounts created via Accounts API since approximately 2:10AM PT on 7 December 2023 are unavailable in IE1 region. Teams are working to restore normal functionality. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information is available.

We are continuing to see recovery across multiple Twilio products. We will continue monitoring to ensure full service stability. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to see recovery across multiple Twilio products. We will continue monitoring to ensure full service stability. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to see recovery across multiple Twilio products. We will continue monitoring to ensure full service stability. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to see recovery across multiple Twilio products. We will continue monitoring to ensure full service stability. We will provide another update in 30 mins or as soon as more information becomes available.

Note: We are making a correction about the previous post; neither SMS nor Programmable Video > Group Rooms were impacted by this incident

We are starting to see recovery across several products. Currently, our engineering teams are reviewing  their services to ensure they are operating normally and remain stable. We will provide another update in 30 mins or as soon as more information becomes available.

Customers will be seeing an elevated error rate and latency for Conversations and Programmable Chat API-s and SDK-s in the IE1 region. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will provide another update in 30Â mins or as soon as more information becomes available.

Customers will be seeing an elevated error rate and latency for Conversations and Programmable Chat API-s and SDK-s in the IE1 region. We will update as soon as we have more information in the next 30 mins

incidents.name: Subset of API requests are failing when rendering the Console

incident_updates.body: The issue with subset of API requests has been resolved and the Twilio Console is operating normally at this time.

We continue to see a high rate of failure for listing and switching subaccounts in Console. Additionally, some users are experiencing âAn error occurredâ error messages on various pages throughout Console. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

There is a high rate of failure for listing and switching subaccounts in Console. Additionally, some users are experiencing âAn error occurredâ error messages on various pages throughout Console. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently seeing a small subset of API requests are failing when rendering the Console, resulting in the "Something went wrong" error message. Our engineering team is looking into the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Our Engineers are Investigating an Issue with Lookup API

incident_updates.body: Twilio Lookup API was degraded for 111 minutes between 12:30 and 02:21AM Pacific Time on 12/05/2023. During this period of time due customers may have experienced errors  for the caller_name package when using the Lookup API. After working with our vendor, the issue has now been resolved.

Twilio Lookup API was degraded for 111 minutes between 12:30 and 02:21AM Pacific Time on 12/05/2023. During this period of time due customers may have experienced errors  for the caller_name package when using the Lookup API. After working with our vendor, the issue has now been resolved.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with the Lookup API. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Flex Insights Delays and Errors

incident_updates.body: Twilio Flex Insights was degraded for 45 minutes between 10:45 am and 11:30 Pacific Time on 12/04/2023. During this period of time customers may have experienced delays and errors loading the page on Twilio console. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: AccSec Verizon US API Error - Unsupported Subscriber

incident_updates.body: The incident affecting Verify API Silent Network Auth method which caused users to receive an "Unsupported Subscriber" error response has now been resolved. It was determined that the incident was related to incompatible handsets and was not caused by degraded carrier performance. The service is operational at this time.

We have started seeing recovery for Verify-Silent Network Auth. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update on 12/04/2023 at 12:00 pm PST or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have started seeing recovery for Verify-Silent Network Auth. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the delivery failures to a subset of phone Numbers In Colombia issue, and it was determined that the impact was limited to a small set of customers, who have been contacted individually to address any concerns.
